last_episode_to_air.name: The Betrayal
last_episode_to_air.overview: The footage causes a shock. Disbelief and anger cause drastic actions. Maurice tries to redeem the past once and for all.

name: Hotel Beau Séjour
overview: What if you had to investigate your own murder? This anthology series follows victims who wake up to find their own dead bodies and have to navigate the limbo between life and death to solve the mystery of who killed them and why.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Teenage Kato Hoeven wakes up in Hotel Beau Séjour without any recollection of what happened the night before. No one seems to be able to see or hear her except a few select people, but why? Slowly it sinks in: she's dead. Who did this to her? As she investigates her own mysterious death, Kato unravels a web of secrets in her seemingly tranquil village community.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Former naval officer Maurice sees his own lifeless body dangling from the mast of his sailboat “Beau Séjour”. He wakes up on the beach hours later, but nobody can see or hear him. He’s dead—apparently, a suicide. What is going on? That his family is glad to be rid of him becomes painfully clear from the harsh, cold reactions of his three daughters and his ex-wife to his death. Maurice starts to investigate his own death. And then he discovers that there are a couple of ‘seers’, people who can still see him and with whom he can talk… but why these people?

episodes.name: The Body
episodes.overview: After finding her own bloody corpse in a hotel bath, Kato slowly realizes that she's dead -- yet a handful of people can still see and hear her.

episodes.name: The Five
episodes.overview: As federal authorities arrive to investigate her death, Kato looks for clues and identifies the five people who can inexplicably still see her.

episodes.name: The Medium
episodes.overview: While Schneider expands the investigation, Kato and Charlie manipulate the police into searching the Hotel Beau Séjour for evidence.

episodes.name: The Opening
episodes.overview: Kato discovers a crucial detail about the night of her death, and Schneider looks for clues in a cold case with striking parallels to Kato's murder.

episodes.name: Full Moon
episodes.overview: After the police focus their suspicions on a mysterious motorcyclist, Kato works to track down a dangerous drug dealer connected to her death.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.overview: Kato suspects the "seers" of harboring secrets about the night she died. Schneider's investigation faces a betrayal from inside the department.

episodes.name: The Film
episodes.overview: Kato makes an unnerving discovery about the night of the festival. The police use DNA to make an arrest, but a leaked sex tape leads to more violence.

episodes.name: The Massland Murders
episodes.overview: As the town reels from further tragedy, Schneider searches for a connection to Kato's murder, and one of the "seers" makes a dramatic confession.

episodes.name: The Confession
episodes.overview: While Schneider harbors doubts about the confession, Alexander makes a discovery and Kato enlists Ines to help her draw out a cryptic online admirer.

episodes.name: The Night
episodes.overview: Dissatisfied with the case, Schneider digs deeper and unravels the final secrets surrounding Kato, who comes face-to-face with her killer.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Teenage Kato Hoeven wakes up in Hotel Beau Séjour without any recollection of what happened the night before. No one seems to be able to see or hear her except a few select people, but why? Slowly it sinks in: she's dead. Who did this to her? As she investigates her own mysterious death, Kato unravels a web of secrets in her seemingly tranquil village community.

episodes.name: The Storm
episodes.overview: Former naval officer Maurice sees his own lifeless body dangling from the mast of his sailboat 'Beau Séjour'. He wakes up on the beach hours later, but nobody can see or hear him. He's wandering around like some kind of living dead man. But why?

episodes.name: The Video
episodes.overview: Maurice still has no memory of the night of the storm. He starts an investigation and seeks the help of Vinnie. Maurice discovers that there are more 'seers', people who can still see him and with whom he can talk.

episodes.name: Opie
episodes.overview: The visit to the notary causes a stir among the sisters and Bea. Maurice comes face to face with them. Vinnie speaks to the medical examiner, he is convinced that something is not right.

episodes.name: The Campfire
episodes.overview: Maurice needs Vinnie's help again, who fortunately doesn't hesitate. Bea and Tille go looking for answers. Seven years earlier, Esther was put under pressure during her training.

episodes.name: The Boat
episodes.overview: The truth about the bonfire sheds new light on the night of the storm. Vinnie takes Maurice to an interrogation, but this does not work out well. Lola's heartbreak gets out of hand.

episodes.name: The Accident
episodes.overview: Maurice learns something important on his condition. Britt is increasingly falling apart. The family worries about her. Erik's death left a torn family behind.

episodes.name: The Article
episodes.overview: Maurice tries to find a way to comfort Britt. Bea discovers something disturbing about Tille's past and the situation escalates. Vinnie turns to Mira and together they continue their search for clues. Alice feels unsafe.

episodes.name: The Deceit
episodes.overview: Maurice tries to find an explanation for last night. Britt is having a hard time, Alice keeps an eye on her. Maurice and Vinnie go after a liar.

episodes.name: A Second Chance
episodes.overview: The water sample gives the investigation a boost. Meanwhile, a disappointed Alice stays in the hold of Yasmine and Maurice thinks he knows why his 'seers' exist.

episodes.name: The Betrayal
episodes.overview: The footage causes a shock. Disbelief and anger cause drastic actions. Maurice tries to redeem the past once and for all.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Former naval officer Maurice sees his own lifeless body dangling from the mast of his sailboat “Beau Séjour”. He wakes up on the beach hours later, but nobody can see or hear him. He’s dead—apparently, a suicide. What is going on? That his family is glad to be rid of him becomes painfully clear from the harsh, cold reactions of his three daughters and his ex-wife to his death. Maurice starts to investigate his own death. And then he discovers that there are a couple of ‘seers’, people who can still see him and with whom he can talk… but why these people?
